name: spanid

stmt.origin: eqtrd(cfv(cspn, c0), c0, cint(crab(hs0, csh, wss(c0, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, csh))
stmt.pretty: eqtrd((span ` c0), c0, ⋂ { hs0 ∈ SH | c0 ⊆ hs0 }, c0 ∈ SH)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, csh), wceq(cfv(cspn, c0), c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csh), wceq(cfv(cspn, c0), cint(crab(hs0, csh, wss(c0, cv(hs0))))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csh), wceq(cint(crab(hs0, csh, wss(c0, cv(hs0)))), c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ SH →(span ` c0)= c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SH →(span ` c0)= ⋂ { hs0 ∈ SH | c0 ⊆ hs0 })
⊣ (c0 ∈ SH → ⋂ { hs0 ∈ SH | c0 ⊆ hs0 } = c0)

comment: A subspace of Hilbert space is its own span. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
